name: Aka Sai Lalith Kumar (Sunny)
about: I am an upcoming Ph.D. student in computer science department at the University of Colorado, Boulder, where I will be advised by Gowtham Kaki. Currently, I am a consultant with Industry Solutions, Microsoft overseeing enterprise security. Before Microsoft, I completed my bachelor's in ECE at Shiv Nadar University, where I worked under Sweta Mishra.
research: My intrests are cryptography, formal methods, and verification.
